72231.装備品は 最初に装備した人が\nその装備の使用者となります。\n<br>\n一度:
The first person to equip an item becomes the user of that item. Once a piece of equipment has been assigned to a user, it cannot be
passed on to another user, but do you want to equip <%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>?

72232.<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>を 装備せずに\nそうびぶくろに:
Do you want to put <%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> in
your sash without equipping it?<yesno><close>

72234.<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>は 今の職業では\n装備できないた:
<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> can't be equipped
with the current profession, so it can't be
changed in one shot...

72235.<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>は 今のレベルでは\n装備できない:
The <%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> can't be equipped
at the current level, so you can't change it
in one shot...

72236.<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>は 種族専用装備のため \nきせか:
<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> is race-specific
equipment, so it can't be worn by Kisekae
dolls...

72237.装備品がないため 一発チェンジできません。:
We have no equipment, so we can't make a
single change...

72239.そうびぶくろが いっぱいのため\n装備品を 交換できません。:
We've got a lot of bags, so we can't trade
equipment.

72240.そうびぶくろが いっぱいのため\n装備品を しまえません。:
We've got a lot of storage space for
equipment...

72241.今の職業では <%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>を\n装備できません:
In my current profession, I can equip
<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>...

72242.レベルが足りないため\n<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>を 装備で:
I can't equip <%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> because
I'm not high enough level...

72243.<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>は 種族専用装備のため \nきせか:
<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> is race-specific
equipment, so it can't be worn by Kisekae
dolls...

72244.<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>は\n性別が合わない装備品のため\:
<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> is not gender
appropriate equipment, so it can't be worn by
Kisekae dolls...

73065.不明なエラーにより\n処理を終了できませんでした。: Unable to finish due to unknown error...

73066.<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>は 新品の装備品です。\n装備せず:
<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> is a new piece of
equipment... Do you want to keep it in your
bag without equipping it?<yesno><close>

74001.<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>を\nきせかえドールから はずして:
The <%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> is removed from
the dress-up doll and placed in a storage
bag...

74016.一度 装備すると 新品ではなくなりますが\n<%sM_item><%sM_plu:
Can I equip <%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> once it's
no longer new?<yesno 2><close>

74017.一発チェンジを やめました。: I'm going to make a change.

74062.<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>は\n職人道具のため\nきせかえド:
<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> is a craftsman's
tool, so it can be equipped on a dress-up
doll...

74704.<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>は\nきせかえドールに 装備させら:
<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> can't be equipped on
a dress-up doll, so it can't be changed at
once...

74705.<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>は\nきせかえドールに装備させられ:
<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> can be equipped on
Kisekae dolls...

75629.ワンタイムパスワードが 設定されていないため\nこの機能は 使用できません。:
You can't use this function because you don't
have a one-time password.

76097.アクセサリーも きせかえドールの装備と\nチェンジしますか？\n<yesno 2:
Do the accessories change with the Kisekae
doll's equipment?<yesno 2><close>

78840.きせかえドールが装備している\n<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>と:
Do you want to exchange the <%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> that your dress-up doll is equipped with for the
<%sM_pcitem><%sM_pcplusnum> that you are equipped with? If you can't equip them, you can enter the sobriquet without equipping
them...

79480.<%sM_pcitem><%sM_pcplusnum>は\n現在 装備しているも:
<%sM_pcitem><%sM_pcplusnum> is the item you
currently have equipped... Do you want to
remove it and equip it to your dress-up doll?<yesno><close>

85383.<%sM_pcitem><%sM_pcplusnum>は\n現在 仲間モンスター:
<%sM_pcitem><%sM_pcplusnum> is currently equipped by a fellow monster... Do you want to remove it and equip it to your dress-up
doll?

115165.<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>は\nドレスアップにより 性別が異:
The <%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> can be equipped
on your dress-up dolls as they have different
genders depending on their dress-up...

118378.きせかえドールが 両手武器を\nそうびしています。 片手ロック状態では\n一発チ:
It's a two-handed weapon... When one hand is
locked, the other can be changed at will.

118379.両手武器に 片手がロックされています。\n一発チェンジしたい場合は 片手のロック:
If you're using a two-handed weapon and one hand is locked... If you want to make a one- shot change, you'll need to unlock one hand
or lock both hands...

119073.きせかえドールの そうびひんに\n新品のそうびが ふくまれているため\n一発チェ:
I'm sure you'll be able to figure out what's
going on here.

191101.<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum>は\n装備させる場所を 選べます。:
<%sM_item><%sM_plusnum> allows you to choose
where to equip it... Where would you like to
equip it?
<select_se_off>
face accessory
face-coating
<select_end><close>
